A

A_Currency - Class in task6.money
Defines the shared elements of a currency denomination that can represent any unit of coin or bill; e.g., dime, nickel, single, five.
A_Currency(Money, String) - Constructor for class task6.money.A_Currency
Creates a currency denomination.
